name: Starlight (itch) (Tsutalya)
description:
Greetings, star-protector. The stars are in terrible danger; many of their cores are collapsing, sending their remains shooting across the galaxy. We need you to save them. In each collapsing star are three core fragments which when put back together will save the star. But be careful, the stars contain and are surrounded by dangerous star flares. 

WASD/arrow key movement, mouse to look around.
